text: Hey Tamers12345, I watched your interview yesterday and I really loved it. I honestly thought that sega had dropped a c&d when you made the first MLP/sonic underground crossover as sonic and Bartleby literally gets consumed by a void called the sega zone, and there was a time without any new sonic underground animations right after. I'm happy that you can still make animations of the show you love. I have no doubt that you'll be huge in the world of YouTube animation one day, despite the uphill battle against the algorithm. Love your work, keep on
